t584401a2: Save hundreds of thousands on roof renewals
tn57b1fc97: Does your roof need professional help?
tn5d4d34ed: Let us come to you for an inspection. Find out how much you can save
t5c5ff404: The roof is inspected for damage. We are considering if any stones need to be replaced. If the rim has major damage, it may be too late for roof renewal.
tn5d3b0993: Roof tiles, gutters and downspouts are thoroughly cleaned with special machines. We also remove moss and other impurities.
t691ca767: The roof is deep impregnated to make it water-repellent. This drastically increases the service life.
t1b9441c3: The roof is being painted to be even more water-repellent. We apply one coat of 500um, which will last for many years. You also get to choose a new color and gloss for your ceiling.
t1506549f: The result - your roof is in better condition than the new one!
t6d42d1b9: Roof tile manufacturers often do not do the best job when it comes to impregnation and painting, as it requires a lot of time. We place great focus on doing the best we can. We give your roof a new life.
t7a483e61: Types of roofs that we can renew

t2f0419ce: We give new life to your stairs. By renewing and preserving your old staircase, you save time, money and the environment.
t53730ee8: We check your stairs and measure every step with a specially developed device that makes a digital 3D drawing.
tn471ac77d: You configure your new steps. Among other things, you can choose between different types of wood and surface treatments.
t521614c2: Your configuration and 3D drawing will be forwarded to production where your new steps will be produced and shipped.
t3a3ef72d: The steps come with a DIY package that includes everything you need to assemble it yourself. We can also assemble them for you.
t3a3f6f29: The result - your stairs restored and have a new fresh look.

tn72d006f6: When Vegrad Furhovden started Takfornying AS in 2014, the intention was to create a customer platform that was based on satisfied and safe users of our services. Something as unique and obvious as cleaning, impregnating and painting roof tiles was exactly what the market was looking for. And this is how the adventure begins, because it has been exclusively. With paint sales by Drywood and Teknos, House Renewal is also intended as a tool for adapted self-help.
tn1fc31087: Vegard's visions and goals are governed by being able to make everyday life for its customers efficient, financially smart and more beautiful with simpler grips.
tb9c4e49: Husfornying wants to offer the customer all solutions, and further develop the conservation & renewal mantra. The customers are economical, and largely want to retain rather than replace. With smart users and increasing demand, Husfornying is a symbol and a clear transformation where the customer will be heard and we will with all our means be able to simplify and make available all tools in the renovation phases, so that the customer can more easily find smart solutions.
